sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Asset resource.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Asset resource.

service_sid.description: The SID of the Service that the Asset resource is associated with.

friendly_name.description: The string that you assigned to describe the Asset resource. It can be a maximum of 255 characters.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT when the Asset resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

date_updated.description: The date and time in GMT when the Asset resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Asset resource.

links.description: The URLs of the Asset resource's nested resources.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Asset Version resource.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Asset Version resource.

service_sid.description: The SID of the Service that the Asset Version resource is associated with.

asset_sid.description: The SID of the Asset resource that is the parent of the Asset Version.

path.description: The URL-friendly string by which the Asset Version can be referenced. It can be a maximum of 255 characters. All paths begin with a forward slash ('/'). If an Asset Version creation request is submitted with a path not containing a leading slash, the path will automatically be prepended with one.

visibility.description: The access control that determines how the Asset Version resource can be accessed. Can be:  `public`, `protected`, or `private`.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT when the Asset Version resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Asset Version resource.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Build resource.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Build resource.

service_sid.description: The SID of the Service that the Build resource is associated with.

status.description: The status of the Build. Can be: `building`, `completed`, or `failed`.

asset_versions.description: The list of Asset Version resource SIDs that are included in the Build.

function_versions.description: The list of Function Version resource SIDs that are included in the Build.

dependencies.description: A list of objects that describe the Dependencies included in the Build. Each object contains the `name` and `version` of the dependency.

runtime.description: The Runtime version that will be used to run the Build resource when it is deployed.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT when the Build resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

date_updated.description: The date and time in GMT when the Build resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Build resource.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Build resource.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Build resource.

service_sid.description: The SID of the Service that the Build resource is associated with.

status.description: The status of the Build. Can be: `building`, `completed`, or `failed`.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Build Status resource.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Deployment resource.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Deployment resource.

service_sid.description: The SID of the Service that the Deployment resource is associated with.

environment_sid.description: The SID of the Environment for the Deployment.

build_sid.description: The SID of the Build for the deployment.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT when the Deployment resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

date_updated.description: The date and time in GMT when the Deployment resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Deployment resource.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Environment resource.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Environment resource.

service_sid.description: The SID of the Service that the Environment resource is associated with.

build_sid.description: The SID of the build deployed in the environment.

unique_name.description: A user-defined string that uniquely identifies the Environment resource.

domain_suffix.description: A URL-friendly name that represents the environment and forms part of the domain name.

domain_name.description: The domain name for all Functions and Assets deployed in the Environment, using the Service unique name, a randomly-generated Service suffix, and an optional Environment domain suffix.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT when the Environment resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

date_updated.description: The date and time in GMT when the Environment resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Environment resource.

links.description: The URLs of the Environment resource's nested resources.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Function resource.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Function resource.

service_sid.description: The SID of the Service that the Function resource is associated with.

friendly_name.description: The string that you assigned to describe the Function resource. It can be a maximum of 255 characters.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT when the Function resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

date_updated.description: The date and time in GMT when the Function resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Function resource.

links.description: The URLs of nested resources of the Function resource.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Function Version resource.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Function Version resource.

service_sid.description: The SID of the Service that the Function Version resource is associated with.

function_sid.description: The SID of the Function resource that is the parent of the Function Version resource.

path.description: The URL-friendly string by which the Function Version resource can be referenced. It can be a maximum of 255 characters. All paths begin with a forward slash ('/'). If a Function Version creation request is submitted with a path not containing a leading slash, the path will automatically be prepended with one.

visibility.description: The access control that determines how the Function Version resource can be accessed. Can be: `public`, `protected`, or `private`.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT when the Function Version resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Function Version resource.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Function Version resource.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Function Version resource.

service_sid.description: The SID of the Service that the Function Version resource is associated with.

function_sid.description: The SID of the Function that is the parent of the Function Version.

content.description: The content of the Function Version resource.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Log resource.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Log resource.

service_sid.description: The SID of the Service that the Log resource is associated with.

environment_sid.description: The SID of the environment in which the log occurred.

build_sid.description: The SID of the build that corresponds to the log.

deployment_sid.description: The SID of the deployment that corresponds to the log.

function_sid.description: The SID of the function whose invocation produced the log.

request_sid.description: The SID of the request associated with the log.

level.description: The log level. Can be: `info`, `warn`, or `error`.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT when the Log resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Log resource.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Service resource.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Service resource.

friendly_name.description: The string that you assigned to describe the Service resource.

unique_name.description: A user-defined string that uniquely identifies the Service resource. It can be used in place of the Service resource's `sid` in the URL to address the Service resource.

include_credentials.description: Whether to inject Account credentials into a function invocation context.

ui_editable.description: Whether the Service resource's properties and subresources can be edited via the UI.

domain_base.description: The base domain name for this Service, which is a combination of the unique name and a randomly generated string.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT when the Service resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

date_updated.description: The date and time in GMT when the Service resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Service resource.

links.description: The URLs of the Service's nested resources.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Variable resource.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Variable resource.

service_sid.description: The SID of the Service that the Variable resource is associated with.

environment_sid.description: The SID of the Environment in which the Variable exists.

key.description: A string by which the Variable resource can be referenced.

value.description: A string that contains the actual value of the Variable.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT when the Variable resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

date_updated.description: The date and time in GMT when the Variable resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Variable resource.

info.title: Twilio - Serverless
info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.

/v1/Services/{ServiceSid}/Assets.description: A wrapper that represents a static file and groups the different Versions of the static file.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Assets.

parameters.name: ServiceSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Service to read the Asset resources from.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

Access-Control-Allow-Origin.description: Specify the origin(s) allowed to access the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Methods.description: Specify the HTTP methods allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Headers.description: Specify the headers allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Credentials.description: Indicates whether the browser should include credentials

get.description: Retrieve a list of all logs.

parameters.name: ServiceSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Service to read the Log resource from.

parameters.name: EnvironmentSid
parameters.description: The SID of the environment with the Log resources to read.

parameters.name: FunctionSid
parameters.description: The SID of the function whose invocation produced the Log resources to read.

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: The date/time (in GMT, ISO 8601) after which the Log resources must have been created. Defaults to 1 day prior to current date/time.

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: The date/time (in GMT, ISO 8601) before which the Log resources must have been created. Defaults to current date/time.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page

UniqueName.description: A user-defined string that uniquely identifies the Service resource. It can be used as an alternative to the `sid` in the URL path to address the Service resource. This value must be 50 characters or less in length and be unique.

FriendlyName.description: A descriptive string that you create to describe the Service resource. It can be a maximum of 255 characters.

IncludeCredentials.description: Whether to inject Account credentials into a function invocation context. The default value is `true`.

UiEditable.description: Whether the Service's properties and subresources can be edited via the UI. The default value is `false`.
